DOC.brief_summary: A monocentric prospective open study to evaluate the frequency and nature of cognitive complications in the 3rd month post pulmonary transplant.
DOC.criteria: Patients more than 18 years of age. Enregistered in lung transplant waiting list Have given their agreement to be enrolled in the study Patients had a previous lung transplant patients with insufficient level of french language that may affect the comprehension and answering the psychometric test
